DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics ( include food effect ) single multiple dos Z-360 healthy Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Healthy Subject Study With Z-360 Placebo
DOC.detailed_description: This single centre , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , food effect study.This three part study . The purpose first part ( Part 1 ) evaluation safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics single ascend dos Z-360.The second part ( Part 2 ) evaluation pharmacokinetics food effect Z-360.The third part ( Part 3 ) evaluation safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics multiple ascend dos Z-360 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male subject 20 49 year age inclusive 2 . Body mass index ( BMI ) within range 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 inclusive 3 . The subject capable give write informed consent prior admission study 1 . History presence drug hypersensitivity , drug dependence , narcotic dependence alcohol dependence 2 . History presence disease digestive , liver , kidney , blood , cardiovascular , neuropsychiatric may affect participation result study 3 . Positive test Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C antibody , HIV antigen antibody Serological test syphilis 4 . Use medication within 1 week prior dose 5 . Received investigational drug new active ingredient within 16 week prior dose study receive investigational drug clinical study within 12 week 6 . Whole blood collection exceed 200 mL within 4 week , apheresis within 2 week , blood withdrawal exceed 400 mL within 12 week ( blood donation , etc ) prior dose 7 . Others , patient unfit study determine attend physician
